value:
The idea of fighting beside those
I've read about in books makes
me...a bit nervous.

I was very close to my friend
Clarisse. We were orphans, and we
swore...to look after each other.

Don't work yourself too hard, and
be sure to get rest. If you can't
sleep...I could sing you a lullaby.

You do such a splendid job as a
tactician. I once studied for such a
role...but decided it wasn't for me.

I wonder if we have ever met before,
$Nu.$k$pPerhaps in the world I'm from?

Hello. My name is Katarina.
I've come to deliver a hello
from $Nf.

I did it! I only hope...that you're
proud of me.
That wasn't too bad, was it?

Poorly done. I'm sorry. Please
don't be disappointed.

This means so much to me.
I'd do anything for you.

Please, call me Katarina. I once
planned to be a tactician, but that...
didn't work out. I have magic though!

In my world, there was someone very
dear to me. You've always reminded
me of that person.$k$pThat person was like a Hero to me
but is neither in this world or
that one.$k$pSo I did some reading about other
worlds here, and I came to a
curious conclusion.$k$pYou are that person.$k$pI know...I know... It makes no sense.
Perhaps it's even unsettling to
hear such a thing!$k$pWhether I am wrong or you simply
don't recall those days, I pledge
my service to you fully.$k$pI'm not sure I'm always the most
competent person in your group, but
I will always give you my best!
えいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
That was... not what I planned...
I will defeat you!
It's time to end this!
Sorry to do this...
I've come to finish you.
My dream...
hehe
Is there something I can do for you?
I'm so sorry. For—? Oh, just sorry.
If it ever helps, I once studied to be a tactician.
You're such a great tactician. Could you teach me to be the same?
I will do anything that you request of me.
How can I ever atone for...what I did?
I'm delighted that you accepted me into your group.
Yes?
Your command?
Ready.
